error.birth-date-empty: Please enter a valid birth date.
error.last-name-invalid: Please make sure your last name is between 5 and 50 characters long.
error.first-name-invalid: Please make sure your first name is between 5 and 50 characters long.
error.email-invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
error.email-exist: The entered email address is already registered. Please enter another email address.

register.title-server-message: All the information you share with us on Wow Libre is like the special ingredient in your amazing experience! The more we know, the better we can make your experience truly extraordinary. So, share that data with us and get ready for something out of the ordinary!

kown-you.title-server-message: Your real name may be used in the future to verify your identity when you contact WowLibre. By default, your real name will remain hidden from other users.

contact-means.title-server-message: This is what you will use when logging into websites and mobile applications.

error.empty-field-message: Please complete all required fields to continue
error.authentication-message: The data is invalid, please check your information
